title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in the dynamic text item and the data/text item is different.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Retrieve a datetime value from a table. Check the format displayed in the dynamic text item. 2. Retrieve the same datetime value from the table again. Check the format displayed in the data/text item. The formats should match in both cases.
